thread.section_title: Not Socks Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Not Socks | notsocks.co.nz
thread.title: Chrystal Robertson
thread.title_full: Not Socks reviewed by Chrystal Robertson

author: Chrystal Robertson
title: Chrystal Robertson
text:
I have made a few purchases through 'Not Socks' now and I have nothing but good things to say about this company !!
First of all their customer service is amazing!! The staff are so friendly and helpful which is a big thing for me I will not spend money if I get bad customer service. They have a wide selection of very cool & unique items, there is something for everyone. They are so quick to respond to any questions you have about their products etc, delivary is extremely reliable & fast which is a bonus if you are someone like me that leaves things to the last minute !!
I had an issue with one of the items I purchased and they were more than happy to fix the problem no drama no fuss & had my replacement in my hands within 2 days !!
I have recommended 'Not Socks' to my friends and family and I will continue to shop with them :)
Keep up the good work guys n gals :P
